critique: The document is an executive order focused on regulating the petroleum industry. The primary goal is to establish fair competition and prevent unfair practices. As the President, I would want to elicit feelings of joy and surprise that the government is taking action to protect workers and ensure fair practices. I would also want to reduce feelings of fear and disgust related to unfair competition and exploitation. The document's tone is formal and authoritative, which might evoke some fear in those who are not complying with the regulations. The complexity of the regulations might also cause some surprise. The document does not directly evoke sadness or anger.
